title: Degrees:
items: Master "Sport Dentistry" at Università degli Studi di Chieti, 2021
Master “Endodontology and restaurative dentistry”, at Università degli Studi di Siena, 2011.
PhD degree in Morfological sciences, at Università degli Studi di Milano; 2010. Thesis title “ Sperimental techniques in biological surface analysis. Applications at perioral region”.
MSc degree in “Doctor Dental Surgery”, at Università degli Studi di Milano; 2006. Thesis title “Labial morphology 3D analysis in healthy young adults”.
High School Graduate “Dental Technician”, 2001 at IPSIA “Giacomo Ceconi” in Udine.

title: Research activity:
items: At Functional Anatomy Research Center (FARC), Università degli Studi di Milano.
Author and Co-Author of scientific papers and book chapters about head and neck functional anatomy.

title: Teaching activity:
items: Lecturer at the Master “Orofacial pain and temporomandibular disorders: diagnosis and integrated therapy" at Università degli Studi di Napoli Federico II
Lecturer at the Master "Sport Dentistry" at Università degli Studi di Chieti
Lecturer in Specialization Courses “Instrumental evaluation of the stomatognatic apparatus” and in the bachelor’s degree “Dental Hygiene” at Università degli Studi di Milano.
Divulgation of principles of masticatory and neck muscles eletromyography.
